name: Hugs (Proud Mom Games)
description:
Hugs is a game I made for an arcade machine for the WVU Game Developers Club, but it works on pc just fine. In it, you and your friend must run towards each other and hug to progress. I think it's kinda fun. There are only ten levels, but I am considering expanding the game.

Huge shoutout to Audrey Haller for the amazing music.

CONTROLS

red: wasd

blue: arrow keys

m to mute music

UPDATE: now 20 levels, checkpoint on ten

The jar download will run better than the browser version, just download and run the jar file. Requires Java.
